name: Isle Of Chelonia
description:
Isle of Chelonia is a simple farming game created for a 48 hour itch.io pizza jam. Your goal is to build as big a farm as possible while dealing with pesky turtles and wildfires. Every day you will have to pay tax, which increases per day. Based off of the the theme name "Turtle Island", and to a lesser extent, "Vintage Crop".

Feedback much appreciated.
